[`loadPrism`](loadPrism)

## loadPrism() function

Load Prism.js and return a promise to the global Prism object. Can also use `Prism` after this promise resolves to get the same reference.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function loadPrism(): Promise<any>;
```
**Returns:**

`Promise``<any>`
